description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Are you up for the challenge? Join splodge as he attempts to clear over 40 levels and defeat 7 sinister bosses. Beware however the bosses will not go down without a fight.
description.short: Are you up for the challenge? Join splodge as he attempts to clear over 40 levels and defeat 7 sinister bosses. Beware however the bosses will not go down without a fight.
